name: Kingdom of Dice
description:
Story

Queen Miss Fortune died a few weeks ago and the Kingdom of Dice needs a new heir.

You are the first heir to the throne, but your power-hungry brother Prime stole your pips.

Prime gave all of your pips to his co-conspirators(Bell, Dee Twenty, Sir Dicealot, For-Eyes, Rollette, Moirai) and now they hold what is yours rightfully.

You must now go on an adventure to reclaim what you've lost.
Do this by playing the game "21" against the big 6 and win.

21:

The goal of the game "21" is to get as close as possible to the number 21, whilst not overshooting, which is an instant loss.
To do this 2 dice are rolled and added together and each player has the option to lock in his number or roll again and add the new rolls to the old ones. 
The game ends when either side won at least twice.

Controls

Use W-A-S-D to move, E to interact, and SPACE to jump.
